title: core_pubmed.json
description: JSON schema for core PubMed collection in RCSB Data Warehouse.

_pubmed_id.description: Unique integer value assigned to each PubMed record.

pubmed_central_id.description: Unique integer value assigned to each PubMed Central record.

doi.description: Persistent identifier used to provide a link to an article location on the Internet.

abstract_text.description: A concise, accurate and factual mini-version of the paper contents.

affiliation_info.description: The institution(s) that the author is affiliated with. Multiple affiliations per author are allowed.

mesh_descriptors.description:
NLM controlled vocabulary, Medical Subject Headings (MeSH), 
 is used to characterize the content of the articles represented by MEDLINE citations.
